# 1924 Washington & Jefferson Presidents football team

The 1924 Washington & Jefferson Presidents football team was an American football team that represented Washington & Jefferson College as an independent during the 1924 college football season. The team compiled a 7â€“2 record. David C. Morrow was the head coach.
